definition: tea and cake/refreshments/tea and dimsun 點心|点心, traditional Hong Kong lunch

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
tea break/tea and dimsun 點心|点心, traditional Hong Kong lunch

sentences.english: The children get very rumbustious after tea.
sentences.chinese: 喫茶點後，孩子們變得很吵鬧。

sentences.english: They discussed the question over tea and cakes.
sentences.chinese: 他們邊喫茶點邊討論問題。

sentences.english: We were regaled with tea and cakes.
But the real draw for me is the teacakes.
sentences.chinese: 不過這裏真正吸引我的是這裏的茶點餅乾。

sentences.english: I should like to have a good tea.
Stools at this counter allow customers to be served with refreshments while purchases are gift-wrapped.
sentences.chinese: 在這個櫃檯大便允許顧客用茶點服務而購買禮物。

sentences.english: She wanted tea ready at seven so she could be out by eight.
sentences.chinese: 她要七點鐘備好茶點，這樣她八點以前就可以出門了。

sentences.english: At last the longed-for refreshment arrived.
sentences.chinese: 渴望得到的茶點終於來了。

sentences.english: It has become a rule that we sing during our tea-break.
sentences.chinese: 我們在喫茶點的休息時間裏唱歌已成慣例。

sentences.english: The women would have their tea at six o'clock and she would be able to get away before seven.
sentences.chinese: 女工們六點鐘喫茶點，她七點之前就能離開。

sentences.english: For serving tea, there are fried slices of potatoes and sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 作爲茶點之用的，有炸薯片或甘薯。

sentences.english: I like to entertain friends with music and refreshments at home.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡在家裏用音樂和茶點招待朋友。

sentences.english: We discuss the business over tea and cakes.
sentences.chinese: 我們邊喫茶點邊商洽業務吧。

sentences.english: I reckon he tackles his girlfriend before they eat their tea.
sentences.chinese: 我猜他在喫茶點之前會剷倒他的女朋友。

sentences.english: The couple too enjoys preparing refreshments for the group, together with sister Fang Min.
sentences.chinese: 他們也與芳敏姊妹一同享受以預備茶點服事團契。

definition: to taste a small amount/to sample
gift given when visiting sb (esp. a local specialty brought back from one's travels, or a special product of one's own country taken overseas) (Tw)
convenient/handy/easy/bento (a meal in a partitioned box)/lunchbox
take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
